name: HH_MED_EDIT_DETAILS
description: This table stores details about medication edits in Home Health Remote Client.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HH_MED_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user associated with the medication edit in the remote client.

columns.name: HH_MED_EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: HH_MED_EDIT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant of the medication edit in the remote client.

columns.name: HH_MED_LVO_ID
columns.description: This item stores the supplemental order ID (LVO) created for the medication edit in the remote client.

columns.name: HH_EDIT_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Tracks the Home Health/Hospice episode of the user who last edited/created the order (ORD) on the remote client.
